"diliwarans"(1972) ha hondama naluwata himi shasthriya sammanayak dinu "kamin hom(1978) wani chithrapata wala rangapamin ohu thama prathirupaya goda naga gaththeya. 2001 di ohuge kawi nirmana wu "haward kosel' ha "ali" yana kruthi sandaha honda prathichara labuna pamanak nowa oskar sammana sandahada yojana wiya.

wat badu aapasu gewim pramadayakin thorawa sidu kirimata da piyawara ganna bawa da mehidi sandahan kala deshiya aadayam komasaris jenaralwaraya wat badu pramada wima gewim handunagath siyalla desambar 31 wanida wana wita gewa awasan karana bawa da kiya.mehidi anawaranaya wu karunu mese ya.wat badu anshaye katayuthu widhimath kirimata nawa anshayak da wishesha sewaka pirisak yoda sthapitha kara atha.2010 di janawari masaye sita da ema wasara sandaha siyalu katayuthu sidukara awasan kirimata da salasum kara thibe.hondin badu gewana ayata diri ganwima labadimatath badu rahitha wahanayak miladi ganime pahasukam salasimath athuluwa sahana rasak salaseyi.
ee shri lankawe guwan sewaya wana shri lankan eya layins guwan sewaya wiwechanaya karamin janapathiwaraya sidu kala prakashayaki.

pasugiya okthobar 26 wana da hawas yamaye hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha, wathman janadhipathi maithripala sirisena idiriye rate agramathyawaraya lesa diwrum dena mohothe yahapalana rajaye agramathya ranil wikramasinha ho ejapaye pradhana pele nayakayin kisiweku ho ee pilibandawa dana sitiye natha.

ee anuwa pethsama wibhagayata ganimata awasara dena bawa kiya siti shreshtadhikaranaya wat badda wadi kirime thiranaya ath hitawime athuru niyogayak nikuth karanneda nadda yanna sambandhayen labana 11 wanada thindu karana bawayi sandahan kale.
widuli aaloka sangnya sawikara aththe wahana thadabadaya awama kirimata ha eewa nisi paridi dhawanayata kala wela wen kirimatayi.
ee nisa api redda wath maru karala balamu.
klak widya prabandha nawakatha men ma ketikatha rasak da liya thibenawa.
amarika eksath janapadaya pamanak gathahoth pitasthara krumin ha wrudhikaraka magin wasarak pasa siduwethayi kiyana haniye watinakama lesa ganan bala athi mudala dolar biliyana 40 ki.

pasugiya sathiye wishleshakayinge sahaya samathulithawa bedi giyeya.
gramiya pradeshawala saniparakshaka pahasukam athuluwa anekuth pahasukam labadimen apage janathawage jiwana thaththwaya wadidiyunu kara thibenawa.

awurudu 2500 kata wadi ithihasayak athi sinhala bauddha ratak lesa lokayama piliganna shri lankawe, warthamanaye buddhagama thunwani thanata damimata warthamana palakayan katayuthu kirima galu disthrik eksath bhikshu sanwidhanaya tharaye hela dakina bawa dakunu palath pradhana sanghanayaka pallaththara sumanajothi nahimiyo pereda (25 da) galla kachchuwaththa purana rajamaha wiharasthanaye pawathi sangha sabhawedi pawasuha.
